description:
Rylan has a monster cock.
First he used it on Barry, who enjoyed it immensely. Then it came time for him to use it on Branson.
Branson has some very innocent, "boyish" qualities. I honestly don't think he'd ever seen a cock as big as Rylan's, let alone have one that big up his ass.
When he finally saw Rylan's cock he got a very wide-eyed expression on his face!
title: Rylan & Branson
